Literature.Title: Cytotoxic and Antibiotic Cyclic Pentapeptide from an Endophytic Aspergillus tamarii of Ficus carica
Literature.Author: Ma YM, Liang XA, Zhang HC, Liu R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=0.91µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=0.45µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=1.82µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=0.91µM),Penicillium chrysogenum(MIC=3.62µM),Candida albicans(MIC=7.24µM),Fusarium solani(MIC=7.24µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=0.65µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=2.42µM)
